Fix order execution: proper price rounding and fill verification

- Add _round_price\(\) for Hyperliquid 5 significant figures requirement
- Increase market order slippage to 0.5% for reliable fills
- Verify order fill status before recording position
- Use actual fill price instead of mark price for entry

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
